reviews.review_msg: great professor but there was alot of content near the end of the course and it was not clear how we would be tested on it. Provided lots of study questions and resources for studying. Midterm was straight forward but the final was very hard. If you wanna do well ask her questions when ur stuck & go to every ta office hour (VERY helpful)

She is really passionate about biomechanics. Participation was not mandatory however I enjoyed the lectures a lot and so I always felt motivated to go to them anyways. The midterm is really straightforward but the final exam is definitely more challenging. I found all in class and tutorial material to be enough for me.

Prof. Lee is an excellent professor. She's flexible and receptive. The course was in person and on zoom. All lectures were also recorded and available for studying. She really takes the time to stop and get feedback during lectures. Exams were straightforward and clear. Everything on the test was introduced several times in lectures, and tutorials.

Professor Lee was a great teacher and provided a hybrid form of learning, allowing for students to access material and watch lectures from their own computers. Professor Lee was very receptive and open to corrections and questions during lectures, and was often fast when responding to emails. Her exams were very content based.

Loved her. very respected and kind. She made sure we all understood the content. gave us multiple assessments which helped with our grades. her exams are very fair and if u catch up you wont struggle at all.

Sabrina often made mistakes when it came to solving problems in lectures, so students often questioned or corrected her. Besides that, you can tell that she's passionate about biomechanics. Accessible via email and open to chat with students after class. Super straightforward assignments and exams, NO trick questions. Easy marker. Highly recommend!

Max is a nice guy, he's willing to answer questions. However, the content that he teaches in lecture is not very helpful for assignments and tests. His lectures are devoted to teaching concepts and theory however when it comes to solving physics, he rarely does it in class.

BRO JUST take it with him! he does not assume you know everything but rather he teaches you everything whether u know it or not. AND PLEASE GO TO HIS OFFICE HOURS HE IS AWSOME and doesn't judge even if u have no idea what anything is ( AKA MOMENTS) :) the best prof fr fr

I love Prof max he is hands down one of my fav profs this sem. Super nice and caring and always ready to answer all of your questions and if you need help he is more than happy to give you all the help you need. Exams are super fair and everything he taught in lec. 10/10 take this class with him if u have a chance u will not regret it
